body: So basically what I can understand that the kingdom need some kind of new type of clothing never seen before. the ugly bastard claims that he is some kind of tailor who made a cloth so thin that it barely visible but still counted as clothing (which is scam btw and utter bs tbh but everyone believe it anyway) and invited him to measure the queen and 'measure' her and voila it's done. the king and queen show it off to the kingdom and it the clothing become trend, while the ugly bastard finding another prey, hungry for more. At least that's what I can understand, we better se another translator translate this
Need translation ASAP. Really wish this website let us translate stuff ourselves
What? Can someone translate this already. I can't understand shit
